title: Soundarya’s Boutique | E-commerce Platform
description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce application using Next.js 15 and MongoDB, integrating Stripe webhooks for real-time order processing. Built a comprehensive Admin Dashboard featuring Recharts and jsPDF.

title: Eat Right, Feel Bright
description: Developed a gamified learning platform featuring real-time score tracking and interactive audio feedback. Implemented complex state management logic using React Hooks.

title: NYX – Lost and Found Platform (Ongoing)
description: Building a Flutter-based mobile application for reporting and managing lost-and-found items. Developing a RESTful backend in Go (Gin) to handle business logic and PostgreSQL data persistence.
